remarks: Property of a linear functional.  ( ~ lnfnmuli analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 16-Apr-2014.)
statement:
lflmul.d $e |- D = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lflmul.k $e |- K = ( Base ` D ) $.
lflmul.t $e |- .X. = ( .r ` D ) $.
lflmul.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lflmul.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lflmul.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lflmul $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ G e. F /\ ( R e. K /\ X e. V ) ) -> ( G ` ( R .x. X ) ) = ( R .X. ( G ` X ) ) ) $.
